import React, { useState } from 'react' const Billing = () => { const [product,setProductName]=useState(''); const [quantity,setQuantity]=useState(''); const [rate,setRate]=useState(''); const total=0; const gst=0; cons final; function show(){ total=rate *quantity; gst=rate * quantity *0.18; final=(rate *quantity)+(rate *quantity*0.18); } return (

Billing Software

GST No:22AAAAAA0000A1Z5

Product Name

Quantity

Rate

Total

Cost Of the product : {rate*quantity}

GST : {rate*quantity*0.18}

Final Amount To pay : : {(rate*quantity*0.18)+(rate*quantity)}

) } export default Billing
